issue.title: [C++][Parquet] Unable to subclass parquet::StreamWriter when statically linking and using C++17

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12840?focusedCommentId=17352514) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Thanks for digging into this. Would you like to submit your patch as a PR?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12840?focusedCommentId=17436038) by Edward Nolan (ednolan):*
It turns out that this issue wasn't an ODR violation. It was actually caused by a mismatch between the C++ version used to compile Arrow and the C++ version used to compile the program that subclassed StreamWriter. Building Arrow with -DCMAKE_CXX_STANDARD=17 resolved the issue.
